amendment.description: Amendment to allow the Secretary of Homeland Security to use a secondary authentication system for individuals applying for transportation security cards when fingerprints are not able to be taken or read to enhance transportation security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 110-604 to allow the Secretary of Homeland Security to use a secondary authentication system for individuals applying for transportation security cards when fingerprints are not able to be taken or read to enhance transportation security.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Lofgren, Zoe.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren, Zoe amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
